dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: So I was told that maybe science is one of your favorite subjects at school. Is that right?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Have you actually studied light yet?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Okay what have you learned so far about light?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: So we learned how to actually light up a light bulb.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Oh really? Oh excellent. Well I'm somebody who studies lasers. So what do you think about lasers?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: I don't know--

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: You haven't got to play with lasers. So I brought one. It's my friend's cat toy. Do you ever use a laser as a cat toy?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: No.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Well one of the fun things people do with lasers, the cat will try to grab that dot. I'm sure what you have at home is a flashlight. I brought a cute little one. So the question is, do you see any difference between what a flashlight does and what a laser does?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Flashlight is a bigger shine and the laser is just a dot.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: That's true, that laser's just a dot. And so the other thing to notice though is that, like if I shine it in your eyes and I'm sorry if I do! But it seems awfully bright doesn't it? And yet when, you know, you shine this down and you put the laser, which one do you see easier?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: [Harmoni] The laser.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: The laser. So which one do you think's more powerful?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: The laser.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: [Donna] And yet it's not. Isn't that amazing?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: One of the things that lasers are great for is that because it's a directed beam, we can actually put that light where we want the light to go and sometimes you maybe just want to see something around the corner and you can't see it. But with a laser, you can actually and this is a smoky one so you can actually watch it go. You see it actually bending the corner?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: And that's because the light will go through this glass and, when it hits that corner, it has to bend. And we actually send laser beams down glass fibers, the size of your hair.

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yeah.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: So this obviously is much bigger than our hair. Right?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: So this is just a demonstration. If you have a laser like this, it actually bends and comes out, I'm gonna point it to you and you'll see it coming out the other end. It hits these walls, it has to go around and come out the other side. You wanna play? So is this the first time you've seen a laser or have you gotten to play with lasers somewhere else?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: I don't have a cat or--

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: You don't have a cat. So you don't need a cat toy no. Have you ever gone to a grocery store and just scanned your objects over?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Have you ever seen that maybe there's a little bit of a red light when you do that?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: That's a laser. We cut steel with them now. We actually do surgery with lasers. You know when some people have either scars or birth marks that they don't want to see? We can actually remove those with lasers now. Never seen a laser light show? When they light up the sky with lasers, it's almost like fireworks.

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Well I saw a shooting star before.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Oh you got to see a shooting star? Well that's cool, that's nature giving you the show there. So what do you think about lasers? You think they're fun?

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Yes they're very cool. I like the one where you did the green one.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: The green one. And the next time you go to a grocery store, take a peek at the red.

dialogue.author: Explainee
dialogue.text: Okay.

dialogue.author: Explainer
dialogue.text: Okay.
